alert.note: Alert for Hendry (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 7:06PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Hendry and northwestern Palm Beach Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 706 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Indiantown to Lake Harbor. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belle Glade, Clewiston, Pahokee, South Bay, Canal Point, Lake Harbor, Okeelanta, Belle Glade Camp, Fremd Village-Padgett Island and Harlem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.
